channel.title: Django on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Django on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: How to run Django on Google App Engine - results of the Ann Arbor Google App Engine hackathon
item.description: I'm at the Google App Engine hackathon in Ann Arbor.  My goal for the day is to get a Django instance running on top of appengine as much as possible, using as much of the existing code base that's out there that I can.  (This instead of say, hacking a wiki, which is what their sample app is - been there done that.) Here's some background reading: Using Django with Appengine - Shabda Raaj.
